thumb.title: This Year's Black [original song, Vocaloid, Haruka]
thumb.description: LyricsI wear blackIt frames my moodStirring, restlessIt isn't coolAnd yet I love everythingBit the hand that sought to help meSo much to doCannot see the light for meSo much to do nowI wear blackYou've gone nowI wear blackIt frames my moodStirring, restlessIt isn't coolAnd yet I love everythingChances clear that I've been givenSo much to do Reflect the lightI wear blackit breaks my moodStirring, restless, I'm unfulfilledAnd yet I love everythingBack-off. I'm not having callers anymoreSorry, sorryOh, so much, so much to do nowI wear blackAs you've gone now
